input.sentences: the small town had an old car festival .
someone even brought a horse and buggy !
classic cars drove up and down the street .
classic car collectors loved to show off .
everyone had a fun time looking at the old cars .
output.sentences: Yearly town festival is today, the little girl's bike is ready for her and she is looking forward to meet her little boyfriend.
The horse carriage is ready for her 100 years old grandma who does not like car.
Her parents already drove their classic 1929 ALFA ROMEO to the festival.
The next door neighbor's "classic" broken down in the middle of the street.
The boy's parents was a little late, so they tried to catch up.
